title: EnglishPod 初级 英文播客 0130

segments.en: Hello, English learners.
segments.cn: 你好，英语学习者。

segments.en: Welcome back to EnglishPod.
segments.cn: 欢迎回到EnglishPod。

segments.en: My name is Marco.
segments.cn: 我叫Marco。

segments.en: And my name is Catherine.
segments.cn: 我叫Catherine。

segments.en: And today I think we're hitting the gym, Marco.
segments.cn: 今天我想我们要去健身房，Marco。

segments.en: We need to be healthy.
segments.cn: 我们需要保持健康。

segments.en: We've gained weight over the winter, I think.
segments.cn: 我觉得我们冬天长胖了。

segments.en: I think so.
segments.cn: 我也这么认为。

segments.en: And being in an office, you know, it doesn't give you much opportunity to go and exercise and really get a lot of work.
segments.cn: 在办公室里，你知道，这并没有给你太多机会去锻炼和真正工作。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 确实如此。

segments.en: That's why we're going to the gym on this occasion.
segments.cn: 这就是我们这次去健身房的原因。

segments.en: We're going to be pumping some iron.
segments.cn: 我们要举重。

segments.en: We're going to take a look at vocabulary preview and see what this means.
segments.cn: 我们要看看词汇预览，看看这是什么意思。

segments.en: All right, so to pump iron.
segments.cn: 好的，举重。

segments.en: What does that mean?
segments.cn: 这是什么意思？

segments.en: All right, well, to pumping iron means lifting weights.
segments.cn: 好吧，举重就是举哑铃。

segments.en: Okay, so we're pumping iron.
segments.cn: 好的，所以我们在举重。

segments.en: We're lifting weights.
segments.cn: 我们在举哑铃。

segments.en: Because, you know, weights are made of iron.
segments.cn: 因为，你知道，哑铃是由铁制成的。

segments.en: That's what makes them so heavy.
segments.cn: 这就是它们这么重的原因。

segments.en: All right, so we're pumping iron.
segments.cn: 好的，所以我们在举重。

segments.en: Good.
segments.cn: 很好。

segments.en: And, well, we're going to be giving you guys some pointers.
segments.cn: 而且，我们会给你们一些建议。

segments.en: Pointers.
segments.cn: 建议。

segments.en: All right, so you might have heard the word point before.
segments.cn: 好的，你可能听过“点”这个词。

segments.en: Well, pointers is another word for tips.
segments.cn: 好吧，建议是“提示”的另一种说法。

segments.en: All right, so we're going to be giving you tips or advice.
segments.cn: 好的，所以我们会给你们一些提示或建议。

segments.en: Yep, so you're going to get some help today from the trainer.
segments.cn: 是的，所以今天你会从教练那里得到一些帮助。

segments.en: All right, so we're going to jump right into this dialogue.
segments.cn: 好的，我们将直接进入这个对话。

segments.en: And when we come back, we'll be talking more about what's going on.
segments.cn: 当我们回来时，我们会谈论更多发生的事情。

segments.en: Hey there.
segments.cn: 嘿，你好。

segments.en: You look a little lost.
segments.cn: 你看起来有点迷茫。

segments.en: Are you new here?
segments.cn: 你是新来的吗？

segments.en: Yeah.
segments.cn: 是的。

segments.en: How did you know?
segments.cn: 你怎么知道的？

segments.en: You can always spot the newbies.
segments.cn: 你总能认出新手。

segments.en: I can give you a few pointers if you want.
segments.cn: 如果你想，我可以给你一些建议。

segments.en: Were you trying to use this machine here?
segments.cn: 你是在尝试使用这台机器吗？

segments.en: Yeah, I just started my training today and I'm not sure where to begin.
segments.cn: 是的，我今天刚开始训练，不知道从哪里开始。

segments.en: It's okay.
segments.cn: 没关系。

segments.en: I know how it is.
segments.cn: 我知道这种感觉。

segments.en: This machine here will work out your upper body, mainly your triceps and biceps.
segments.cn: 这台机器主要锻炼你的上半身，主要是三头肌和二头肌。

segments.en: Are you looking to develop strength or muscle tone and definition?
segments.cn: 你是想增强力量还是肌肉线条和定义？

segments.en: Well, I don't want to be ripped like you.
segments.cn: 嗯，我不想像你那样壮。

segments.en: I just want a good physique with weights and cardio.
segments.cn: 我只想通过举重和有氧运动保持良好的体型。

segments.en: In that case, you want to work with less weight.
segments.cn: 在这种情况下，你想用较轻的重量。

segments.en: You can start off by working 10 to 15 reps in 4 sets.
segments.cn: 你可以先做10到15次，4组。

segments.en: 5 kilo weight should be enough.
segments.cn: 5公斤的重量应该足够了。

segments.en: Now, it's very important that you stretch before pumping iron.
segments.cn: 现在，在举重之前拉伸是非常重要的。

segments.en: You might pull a muscle.
segments.cn: 你可能会拉伤肌肉。

segments.en: Got it.
segments.cn: 明白了。

segments.en: Wow, is that the weight you're lifting?
segments.cn: 哇，那是你举的重量吗？

segments.en: My goodness, that's a lot of weight.
segments.cn: 我的天，那是很多重量。

segments.en: It's not that much.
segments.cn: 其实没那么多。

segments.en: Just watch.
segments.cn: 你看着。

segments.en: I'm okay.
segments.cn: 我没事。

segments.en: So this guy was a little bit arrogant.
segments.cn: 所以这个家伙有点自负。

segments.en: I think he was very, you know, very muscular.
segments.cn: 我觉得他很壮。

segments.en: But I think he embarrassed himself in front of the lady.
segments.cn: 但我觉得他在女士面前让自己出丑了。

segments.en: The trainer you mean, yeah.
segments.cn: 你是说教练，对吧？

segments.en: Yeah, definitely.
segments.cn: 是的，绝对是。

segments.en: So we say he had a big ego.
segments.cn: 所以我们说他有很大的自尊心。

segments.en: He thought a lot about himself.
segments.cn: 他对自己评价很高。

segments.en: So let's check out some of these phrases and words they were using because they're all related to going to the gym.
segments.cn: 所以让我们看看他们使用的一些短语和单词，因为它们都与去健身房有关。

segments.en: And they can help you if you ever want to get some help when you're at the gym.
segments.cn: 如果你在健身房需要帮助，它们可以帮助你。

segments.en: So this girl, she was new in the gym.
segments.cn: 所以这个女孩，她在健身房是新手。

segments.en: She didn't really know what she was doing.
segments.cn: 她并不知道自己在做什么。

segments.en: And well, the guy said, well, do you want to develop strength or muscle tone?
segments.cn: 而且，这个家伙问她，想增强力量还是肌肉线条？

segments.en: Alright, we know what strength is, but what is muscle tone?
segments.cn: 好吧，我们知道力量是什么，但肌肉线条是什么？

segments.en: Okay, so if you want to develop muscle tone or to have muscle tone, it means that you have healthy muscles.
segments.cn: 好的，如果你想增强肌肉线条，或者有肌肉线条，意味着你有健康的肌肉。

segments.en: Not like huge, big muscles, right?
segments.cn: 不是那种巨大、粗壮的肌肉，对吧？

segments.en: But you have a nice body.
segments.cn: 但你有一个不错的身体。

segments.en: Right, so tone to tone is to maybe give some shape to something.
segments.cn: 对，所以线条就是给某物一些形状。

segments.en: You know, sometimes you have big arms and they're not really... you can't see the muscles.
segments.cn: 你知道，有时你有大臂，但看不出肌肉。

segments.en: Well, muscle tone means that you can start to see the shape and they start to get stronger.
segments.cn: 好吧，肌肉线条意味着你可以开始看到形状，并且它们开始变得更强壮。

segments.en: Alright, so if you think of Madonna maybe five years ago, she had a lot of muscle tone.
segments.cn: 好的，所以如果你想象一下五年前的麦当娜，她有很多肌肉线条。

segments.en: Now she's like big muscles.
segments.cn: 现在她的肌肉很大。

segments.en: Yeah, now she's strong.
segments.cn: 是的，现在她很强壮。

segments.en: But muscle tone means that you can see the muscles, they start to develop.
segments.cn: 但肌肉线条意味着你可以看到肌肉，它们开始发展。

segments.en: Okay, and this actually is very related to our next word because you said muscle tone and definition.
segments.cn: 好的，这实际上与我们的下一个词非常相关，因为你提到了肌肉线条和定义。

segments.en: Right, so definition is another way for us to describe seeing those muscles.
segments.cn: 对，所以定义是我们描述看到那些肌肉的另一种方式。

segments.en: Because at first, you have a big tummy or you have big arms.
segments.cn: 因为一开始，你有一个大肚子或大臂。

segments.en: And when you start to work out, every time you go, you can see more and more definition.
segments.cn: 当你开始锻炼时，每次去，你可以看到越来越多的定义。

segments.en: That means more and more of the muscle becomes visible.
segments.cn: 这意味着越来越多的肌肉变得可见。

segments.en: Alright, so you have defined muscles.
segments.cn: 好的，所以你有了明显的肌肉。

segments.en: Alright, good.
segments.cn: 好的，很好。

segments.en: Now the girl was like, no, no, I don't want to be like super strong and huge, right?
segments.cn: 现在这个女孩说，不，我不想变得超级强壮和巨大，对吧？

segments.en: She doesn't want to look like Arnold Schwarzenegger.
segments.cn: 她不想看起来像阿诺德·施瓦辛格。

segments.en: Yeah, exactly.
segments.cn: 是的，确实如此。

segments.en: She said, I just want a good physique.
segments.cn: 她说，我只想要一个好的体型。

segments.en: Alright, this word maybe sounds strange for some of you because it's... It kind of sounds French to me.
segments.cn: 好吧，这个词对你们中的一些人可能听起来很奇怪，因为它...对我来说有点像法语。

segments.en: It's more like French than English.
segments.cn: 它听起来更像法语而不是英语。

segments.en: Yeah, well it does come from French.
segments.cn: 是的，确实来自法语。

segments.en: And physique is a way to talk about the whole body.
segments.cn: 体型是指整个身体的状态。

segments.en: The physique is the state of your whole body.
segments.cn: 体型是你整个身体的状态。

segments.en: It's your physical appearance.
segments.cn: 这是你的外貌。

segments.en: Okay, so I can say she has a nice physique.
segments.cn: 好吧，我可以说她有一个不错的体型。

segments.en: So that means she probably works out a lot.
segments.cn: 这意味着她可能锻炼很多。

segments.en: But basically, it's like her whole body, right?
segments.cn: 但基本上，它就像她的整个身体，对吧？

segments.en: You can't just say like, she has good physique in her arms or something like that.
segments.cn: 你不能只说她的手臂有好的体型之类的。

segments.en: No, no, your physique, physical, think of the word physical, it's your whole body.
segments.cn: 不，不，你的身材，身体，想想“身体”这个词，是指你的整个身体。

segments.en: Your whole body, alright.
segments.cn: 你的整个身体，好的。

segments.en: So good physique.
segments.cn: 所以好身材。

segments.en: And now the tips that he was giving her, or the pointers, he was talking about these two words, reps and sets.
segments.cn: 现在他给她的建议，或者说指点，他提到了这两个词，重复和组。

segments.en: Right, these are great words for the gym because they allow us to count when we're working out.
segments.cn: 对，这些是健身房的好词，因为它们让我们在锻炼时可以计数。

segments.en: So the first one is reps or repetitions.
segments.cn: 第一个是重复或重复次数。

segments.en: That means doing something over and over again.
segments.cn: 这意味着做某事一遍又一遍。

segments.en: So for example, if I want to lift a weight, I sit down on the bench, I do one, two, three.
segments.cn: 例如，如果我想举重，我坐在长椅上，做一、二、三。

segments.en: How many times I lift that weight is a repetition or a rep.
segments.cn: 我举这个重量的次数就是一次重复或一次重复。

segments.en: Alright, and what about sets?
segments.cn: 好的，那组呢？

segments.en: So I could say I lift the weight ten times, one, two, three, four, all the way to ten.
segments.cn: 我可以说我举这个重量十次，一、二、三、四，一直到十。

segments.en: And then I wait, and then I do it again.
segments.cn: 然后我等一下，再做一次。

segments.en: So the number of times I do it again is a set.
segments.cn: 所以我再做的次数就是一组。

segments.en: So sets of ten or sets of five.
segments.cn: 所以十次一组或五次一组。

segments.en: Okay, so if you are lifting this weight ten times, and you have five sets, you will do a total of?
segments.cn: 好吧，如果你举这个重量十次，而你有五组，你总共会做多少？

segments.en: Fifty pushes or lifts or repetitions.
segments.cn: 五十次推举或举重或重复。

segments.en: Okay, so reps and sets are probably the most important or common words you'll hear in the gym, especially if you're lifting weights, right?
segments.cn: 好吧，所以重复和组可能是你在健身房听到的最重要或最常见的词，尤其是如果你在举重，对吧？

segments.en: Definitely, and sometimes your trainer will count with you so that he'll keep a count while you're working out.
segments.cn: 绝对是，有时你的教练会和你一起计数，以便在你锻炼时保持计数。

segments.en: Cool, so those are the words that we have for you on Language Takeaway.
segments.cn: 很酷，这就是我们在语言收获中为你准备的词。

segments.en: I think in order to better understand these words, we should listen to our dialogue again, but we're going to slow it down just a little bit.
segments.cn: 我认为为了更好地理解这些词，我们应该再听一遍对话，但我们会稍微放慢速度。

segments.en: Hey there, you look a little lost.
segments.cn: 嘿，你看起来有点迷茫。

segments.en: Are you new here?
segments.cn: 你是新来的吗？

segments.en: Yeah, how did you know?
segments.cn: 是的，你怎么知道？

segments.en: You can always spot the newbies.
segments.cn: 你总能认出新手。

segments.en: I can give you a few pointers if you want.
segments.cn: 如果你想，我可以给你一些建议。

segments.en: Were you trying to use this machine here?
segments.cn: 你是在尝试使用这台机器吗？

segments.en: Yeah, I just started my training today.
segments.cn: 是的，我今天刚开始训练。

segments.en: I'm not really sure where to begin.
segments.cn: 我不太确定从哪里开始。

segments.en: It's okay, I know how it is.
segments.cn: 没关系，我知道这种感觉。

segments.en: This machine here will work out your upper body, mainly your triceps and biceps.
segments.cn: 这台机器主要锻炼你的上半身，主要是三头肌和二头肌。

segments.en: Are you looking to develop strength or muscle tone and definition?
segments.cn: 你是想增强力量还是肌肉的线条和定义？

segments.en: Well, I don't want to be ripped like you.
segments.cn: 嗯，我不想像你那样肌肉发达。

segments.en: I just want a good physique with weights and cardio.
segments.cn: 我只想通过举重和有氧运动拥有一个好身材。

segments.en: In that case, you want to work with less weight.
segments.cn: 在这种情况下，你想用较轻的重量。

segments.en: You can start off by working ten to fifteen reps in four sets.
segments.cn: 你可以先做十到十五次重复，四组。

segments.en: Five kilo weights should be enough.
segments.cn: 五公斤的重量应该足够了。

segments.en: Now it's very important that you stretch before pumping iron, or you might pull a muscle.
segments.cn: 现在在举重之前拉伸是非常重要的，否则你可能会拉伤肌肉。

segments.en: Got it.
segments.cn: 明白了。

segments.en: Wow, is that the weight you're lifting?
segments.cn: 哇，那是你举的重量吗？

segments.en: My goodness, that's a lot of weight.
segments.cn: 我的天，那是很多重量。

segments.en: It's not that much.
segments.cn: 其实没那么多。

segments.en: Just watch.
segments.cn: 你看着。

segments.en: I'm okay.
segments.cn: 我没事。

segments.en: Alright, so you might have heard some other phrases in there that sound interesting or new to you.
segments.cn: 好吧，你可能听到了一些听起来有趣或新的短语。

segments.en: And that's why we're going to go into the fluency builder part of the lesson, where we can talk about sounding more fluent in English.
segments.cn: 这就是为什么我们要进入课程的流利度提升部分，在这里我们可以谈论如何在英语中听起来更流利。

segments.en: Alright, so the girl, she was a little bit lost, right?
segments.cn: 好的，所以那个女孩有点迷茫，对吧？

segments.en: So this guy was trying to help her out.
segments.cn: 所以这个家伙试图帮助她。

segments.en: I think it was her first time in the gym.
segments.cn: 我想这是她第一次去健身房。

segments.en: It was, and she doesn't really know where to start, which is a common problem for people who go to the gym for the first time.
segments.cn: 是的，她真的不知道从哪里开始，这对第一次去健身房的人来说是个常见问题。

segments.en: So the guy said, well, yeah, I know how it is.
segments.cn: 所以这个家伙说，嗯，我知道这种感觉。

segments.en: How what is.
segments.cn: 什么感觉？

segments.en: Exactly, how what is.
segments.cn: 正是，什么感觉。

segments.en: It's a very strange phrase because it's vague, it's not clear.
segments.cn: 这是一个非常奇怪的短语，因为它模糊，不清楚。

segments.en: So what is he referring to?
segments.cn: 那么他指的是什么？

segments.en: This is something very common that we say in English to mean, I understand your situation.
segments.cn: 这是我们在英语中常说的，意思是我理解你的处境。

segments.en: I know how you feel.
segments.cn: 我知道你的感受。

segments.en: I know how you feel.
segments.cn: 我知道你的感受。

segments.en: So she says, this is my first time, I don't know what to do.
segments.cn: 所以她说，这是我第一次，我不知道该做什么。

segments.en: And he says, I know how it is, I understand your situation.
segments.cn: 他就说，我知道这种感觉，我理解你的处境。

segments.en: Right, because I imagine the first time he went to the gym, he felt the same way.
segments.cn: 对，因为我想象他第一次去健身房时也有同样的感觉。

segments.en: Exactly, or I could say, I'm so lost, I'm new at this school, I don't even know anyone.
segments.cn: 正是，或者我可以说，我太迷茫了，我在这所学校是新来的，我甚至不认识任何人。

segments.en: Yeah, I know how it is.
segments.cn: 是的，我知道这种感觉。

segments.en: I was new here last year, so trust me, I know how it is.
segments.cn: 我去年也是新来的，所以相信我，我知道这种感觉。

segments.en: Okay, so Marco and I have similar situations, although he has already experienced them.
segments.cn: 好吧，所以马尔科和我有相似的情况，尽管他已经经历过这些。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: So he can help me out.
segments.cn: 所以他可以帮助我。

segments.en: This is a good phrase.
segments.cn: 这是一个好短语。

segments.en: It's actually, I think it's very common for somebody to kind of sympathize with you, huh?
segments.cn: 其实，我认为有人同情你是很常见的，对吧？

segments.en: Absolutely, and it's a really good phrase if you want to help someone who looks lost or confused.
segments.cn: 绝对是，如果你想帮助看起来迷茫或困惑的人，这是一个非常好的短语。

segments.en: So if someone joins your work, if you have a new colleague, and they say, oh, I don't know where anything is, I don't know how to do anything at my job, you say, oh, I know how it is, I was new here last month.
segments.cn: 所以如果有人加入你的工作，如果你有一个新同事，他们说，哦，我不知道任何东西在哪里，我不知道如何做我工作的任何事情，你可以说，哦，我知道这种感觉，我上个月也是新来的。

segments.en: Great.
segments.cn: 很好。

segments.en: And well, now they were talking about, you know, lifting weights and the physique, and she said this interesting word, she says, I don't want to be ripped like you.
segments.cn: 现在他们在谈论举重和身材，她说了这个有趣的词，她说，我不想像你那样肌肉发达。

segments.en: Okay, so many of you have probably heard the other meaning of the word to rip, or ripped.
segments.cn: 好吧，你们中的许多人可能听过“撕裂”这个词的另一种含义。

segments.en: Right, so this is to rip.
segments.cn: 对，这就是撕裂。

segments.en: Yeah, to tear.
segments.cn: 是的，撕裂。

segments.en: But in this case, it's an adjective.
segments.cn: 但在这种情况下，这是一个形容词。

segments.en: It's a way to describe someone's physique, their body.
segments.cn: 这是描述某人身材、身体的一种方式。

segments.en: And we're talking about people who are very, very muscular.
segments.cn: 我们在谈论非常非常肌肉发达的人。

segments.en: Okay, so basically bodybuilders.
segments.cn: 好吧，基本上是健美运动员。

segments.en: Arnold Schwarzenegger is ripped.
segments.cn: 阿诺德·施瓦辛格就是肌肉发达。

segments.en: He has huge muscles.
segments.cn: 他有巨大的肌肉。

segments.en: Madonna is ripped.
segments.cn: 麦当娜也是肌肉发达。

segments.en: She has huge muscles.
segments.cn: 她也有巨大的肌肉。

segments.en: Okay, so it's a very informal way, but it's a very informal way of saying very muscular.
segments.cn: 好吧，这是一种非常非正式的说法，但它是非常非正式的说法，表示非常肌肉发达。

segments.en: Yeah, it's someone who works out a lot.
segments.cn: 是的，这是一个经常锻炼的人。

segments.en: Alright, you're ripped.
segments.cn: 好吧，你很肌肉发达。

segments.en: And after this, we've got one more phrase.
segments.cn: 在这之后，我们还有一个短语。

segments.en: It's actually very important, because when we talk about going to the gym, working out, we have to talk about safety and your health as well.
segments.cn: 这实际上非常重要，因为当我们谈论去健身房、锻炼时，我们也必须谈论安全和健康。

segments.en: It's very easy to hurt yourself.
segments.cn: 很容易受伤。

segments.en: Right, and that's what we want to avoid.
segments.cn: 对，这正是我们想要避免的。

segments.en: You don't want to pull a muscle.
segments.cn: 你不想拉伤肌肉。

segments.en: Alright, pull a muscle.
segments.cn: 好吧，拉伤肌肉。

segments.en: This is a key phrase here, because we have a special combination of verb and noun.
segments.cn: 这是一个关键短语，因为我们有一个特殊的动词和名词组合。

segments.en: The thing that we pull is our muscle.
segments.cn: 我们拉的东西是我们的肌肉。

segments.en: And what we do to it is we pull it.
segments.cn: 而我们对它所做的就是拉它。

segments.en: That means we hurt it.
segments.cn: 这意味着我们伤害了它。

segments.en: So if you don't stretch and you're lifting weights, maybe your muscle will start to hurt and you can't lift anymore.
segments.cn: 所以如果你不拉伸而举重，也许你的肌肉会开始疼痛，你就无法再举了。

segments.en: Yeah, you hurt it.
segments.cn: 是的，你伤害了它。

segments.en: You pulled your muscle.
segments.cn: 你拉伤了肌肉。

segments.en: You pulled a muscle.
segments.cn: 你拉伤了一块肌肉。

segments.en: Or often runners have this problem.
segments.cn: 或者跑步者常常有这个问题。

segments.en: They don't stretch before they run or they run too much.
segments.cn: 他们在跑步前不拉伸，或者跑得太多。

segments.en: And they have a lot of pain in their muscles.
segments.cn: 他们的肌肉会感到很痛。

segments.en: You say, I pulled a muscle.
segments.cn: 你说，我拉伤了肌肉。

segments.en: Now, I think there's another way of saying it also is to tear a muscle, right?
segments.cn: 现在，我认为还有另一种说法是撕裂肌肉，对吗？

segments.en: Tear is more serious.
segments.cn: 撕裂更严重。

segments.en: More serious.
segments.cn: 更严重。

segments.en: A tear is like a little rip in your muscle and you should really see a doctor about that.
segments.cn: 撕裂就像是肌肉上的小撕裂，你真的应该去看医生。

segments.en: Okay, so we don't want you to pull a muscle or to tear a muscle, so be sure to stretch.
segments.cn: 好吧，所以我们不想让你拉伤肌肉或撕裂肌肉，所以一定要拉伸。

segments.en: But we have some more examples with this phrase, to pull a muscle, so let's listen.
segments.cn: 但我们还有一些关于这个短语“拉伤肌肉”的例子，所以让我们听听。

segments.en: Muscle strains, also called pull muscles, are common sports injuries.
segments.cn: 肌肉拉伤，也称为拉伤肌肉，是常见的运动伤害。

segments.en: Example 2.
segments.cn: 示例2。

segments.en: If you do not warm up before a physical activity, you can easily pull a muscle.
segments.cn: 如果你在进行体育活动之前不热身，你很容易拉伤肌肉。

segments.en: Example 3.
segments.cn: 示例3。

segments.en: Anyone can pull a muscle because of overuse, muscle fatigue or through a fall.
segments.cn: 任何人都可能因为过度使用、肌肉疲劳或摔倒而拉伤肌肉。

segments.en: Alright, so now that that's clear, I think we can listen to our gym dialogue one more time and see what happens to this arrogant bodybuilder.
segments.cn: 好吧，现在这很清楚，我想我们可以再听一次我们的健身对话，看看这个傲慢的健美运动员发生了什么。

segments.en: Absolutely.
segments.cn: 绝对可以。

segments.en: Hey there, you look a little lost.
segments.cn: 嘿，你看起来有点迷茫。

segments.en: Are you new here?
segments.cn: 你是新来的吗？

segments.en: Yeah, how did you know?
segments.cn: 是的，你怎么知道的？

segments.en: You can always spot the newbies.
segments.cn: 你总是能认出新手。

segments.en: I can give you a few pointers if you want.
segments.cn: 如果你想，我可以给你一些建议。

segments.en: Were you trying to use this machine here?
segments.cn: 你是在尝试使用这台机器吗？

segments.en: Yeah, I just started my training today and I'm not sure where to begin.
segments.cn: 是的，我今天刚开始训练，不知道从哪里开始。

segments.en: It's okay, I know how it is.
segments.cn: 没关系，我知道那种感觉。

segments.en: This machine here will work out your upper body, mainly your triceps and biceps.
segments.cn: 这台机器主要锻炼你的上半身，特别是三头肌和二头肌。

segments.en: Are you looking to develop strength or muscle tone and definition?
segments.cn: 你是想增强力量还是肌肉的线条和定义？

segments.en: Well, I don't want to be ripped like you.
segments.cn: 嗯，我不想像你那样肌肉发达。

segments.en: I just want a good physique with weights and cardio.
segments.cn: 我只想通过举重和有氧运动保持良好的体型。

segments.en: In that case, you want to work with less weight.
segments.cn: 在这种情况下，你想用较轻的重量。

segments.en: You can start off by working 10 to 15 reps in 4 sets.
segments.cn: 你可以先做10到15次，4组。

segments.en: 5 kilo weight should be enough.
segments.cn: 5公斤的重量应该足够了。

segments.en: Now it's very important that you stretch before pumping iron.
segments.cn: 现在在举重之前拉伸是非常重要的。

segments.en: You might pull a muscle.
segments.cn: 你可能会拉伤肌肉。

segments.en: Got it.
segments.cn: 明白了。

segments.en: Wow, is that the weight you're lifting?
segments.cn: 哇，那是你举的重量吗？

segments.en: My goodness, that's a lot of weight.
segments.cn: 我的天，那是很多重量。

segments.en: It's not that much.
segments.cn: 其实没那么多。

segments.en: Just watch.
segments.cn: 你看着就行。

segments.en: I'm okay.
segments.cn: 我没事。

segments.en: All right, Catherine.
segments.cn: 好的，凯瑟琳。

segments.en: So we know that you are a very healthy person.
segments.cn: 所以我们知道你是一个非常健康的人。

segments.en: You often go to the gym.
segments.cn: 你经常去健身房。

segments.en: This is true.
segments.cn: 这是真的。

segments.en: I like to go to the gym.
segments.cn: 我喜欢去健身房。

segments.en: So, any gym stories?
segments.cn: 那么，有什么健身房的故事吗？

segments.en: Oh gosh, I have lots of gym stories.
segments.cn: 哦，天哪，我有很多健身房的故事。

segments.en: I like to run and I often use the treadmill.
segments.cn: 我喜欢跑步，常常使用跑步机。

segments.en: And I've never really understood the people who don't run on the treadmill.
segments.cn: 我从来不理解那些不在跑步机上跑步的人。

segments.en: People who stand or who walk slowly.
segments.cn: 站着或慢慢走的人。

segments.en: Oh, who walk on the treadmill.
segments.cn: 哦，走在跑步机上的人。

segments.en: And I remember, my gym is usually very crowded.
segments.cn: 我记得，我的健身房通常很拥挤。

segments.en: I remember one time I was at my gym and I wanted to run on the treadmill.
segments.cn: 我记得有一次我在健身房，想在跑步机上跑步。

segments.en: I had a long day at work and I had to go out afterwards so I didn't have much time.
segments.cn: 我工作了一整天，之后还要出去，所以我没有太多时间。

segments.en: I only had an hour.
segments.cn: 我只有一个小时。

segments.en: And I really wanted to run but there's a line for the treadmills.
segments.cn: 我真的想跑，但跑步机排队。

segments.en: There are too many people.
segments.cn: 人太多了。

segments.en: And this particular day I was waiting and waiting and waiting and finally it was my turn and I stepped and a woman cut in front of me.
segments.cn: 那天我等了又等，终于轮到我了，我刚要上去，一个女人却插到了我面前。

segments.en: No.
segments.cn: 不。

segments.en: She cut in front of me and I was so angry.
segments.cn: 她插到了我面前，我非常生气。

segments.en: And what did she do?
segments.cn: 她做了什么？

segments.en: In her heels.
segments.cn: 穿着高跟鞋。

segments.en: Heels?
segments.cn: 高跟鞋？

segments.en: Big shoes.
segments.cn: 大鞋子。

segments.en: She walked for 40 minutes.
segments.cn: 她走了40分钟。

segments.en: Oh my God.
segments.cn: 哦，我的天。

segments.en: You could go outside and walk.
segments.cn: 你可以出去走路。

segments.en: I want to run.
segments.cn: 我想跑。

segments.en: But she was wearing heels at the gym.
segments.cn: 但她在健身房穿着高跟鞋。

segments.en: In her heels at the gym.
segments.cn: 在健身房穿着高跟鞋。

segments.en: Wow.
segments.cn: 哇。

segments.en: Well, I guess you have to look nice when you go to the gym.
segments.cn: 嗯，我想你去健身房时必须看起来不错。

segments.en: Apparently.
segments.cn: 显然是这样。

segments.en: Apparently.
segments.cn: 显然是这样。

segments.en: It is a very popular place for people to meet, right?
segments.cn: 这是一个人们见面的非常受欢迎的地方，对吗？

segments.en: To start dating.
segments.cn: 开始约会。

segments.en: They say after the office, the gym is one of the most common places for people to meet their boyfriends and girlfriends.
segments.cn: 他们说，办公室之后，健身房是人们见到男朋友和女朋友的最常见地方之一。

segments.en: Wow.
segments.cn: 哇。

segments.en: So there is another good reason why you should go to the gym.
segments.cn: 所以你去健身房还有另一个好理由。

segments.en: Absolutely.
segments.cn: 绝对如此。

segments.en: Yeah.
segments.cn: 是的。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: So that is all the time we have for today.
segments.cn: 所以今天的时间就到这里。

segments.en: But we would like to hear if you have any questions, any doubts or comments.
segments.cn: 但我们想听听你是否有任何问题、疑虑或评论。

segments.en: So come to our site, EnglishPod.com.
segments.cn: 所以请访问我们的网站，EnglishPod.com。

segments.en: And if you have any gym stories, we would also like to hear those.
segments.cn: 如果你有任何健身房的故事，我们也想听听。

segments.en: So that is going to do it for us.
segments.cn: 所以这就是我们要说的。

segments.en: Until next time, everyone.
segments.cn: 下次见，大家。

segments.en: Bye.
segments.cn: 再见。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: Bye.
segments.cn: 再见。
